text: Awadhi is an Indo-Aryan language. This language was spoken in a wide area of Awadh including Lucknow and Ayoudhya (Awadh) earlier. Goswami Tulasidas wrote Ramcharitmanas, Geetavali, Kavitavali, and all his Shri Ram poems in this language. Hindi is a much newer language derived on Awadhi. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Indo-Aryan languages Category:Languages of India
